title: Restore product and category data display

requirements.text: Verify and fix the data fetching for products in the backend main.mo getProducts() method to ensure it returns all stored products from the products HashMap

quotes: Restore Data Connection: Reconnect the frontend to the 'products' and 'categories' database tables.

acceptanceCriteria: The getProducts() method successfully returns all products stored in the backend
Products are returned with all required fields (id, name, description, price, stock, category, imageUrl)

requirements.text: Verify and fix the data fetching for categories in the backend main.mo getCategories() method to ensure it returns all stored categories from the categories HashMap

quotes: Restore Data Connection: Reconnect the frontend to the 'products' and 'categories' database tables.

acceptanceCriteria: The getCategories() method successfully returns all categories stored in the backend
Categories are returned with all required fields (id, name, imageUrl)

requirements.text: If the products HashMap is empty, populate it with sample products including at least one product in the 'Mobiles' category with realistic data (name, description, price, stock, imageUrl)

quotes: Check Table Status: If the tables are empty, please restore the sample products/ categories we had earlier (like 'Mobiles').

acceptanceCriteria: At least 3-5 sample products are created if products HashMap is empty
Sample products include realistic mobile phone products with prices between 10,000-50,000
All sample products have valid imageUrl values (placeholder or real product images)

requirements.text: If the categories HashMap is empty, populate it with sample categories including 'Mobiles' and at least 2-3 other relevant e-commerce categories (e.g., 'Electronics', 'Fashion', 'Home & Kitchen')

quotes: Check Table Status: If the tables are empty, please restore the sample products/ categories we had earlier (like 'Mobiles').

acceptanceCriteria: 'Mobiles' category is created with a valid imageUrl
At least 3-4 total categories exist after initialization
Each category has a meaningful name and appropriate imageUrl

requirements.text: Ensure the HomePage's Featured Products section (first 8 products) successfully fetches and displays products using the useGetProducts hook

quotes: Visibility: Ensure the 'Featured Products' and 'Shop by Category' sections on the home page are fetching data correctly now.

acceptanceCriteria: Featured Products section displays up to 8 product cards on the home page
Product cards show product images, names, prices, and add-to-cart buttons
Loading states and error handling work correctly

requirements.text: Ensure the HomePage's Shop by Category section successfully fetches and displays all categories using the useGetCategories hook

quotes: Visibility: Ensure the 'Featured Products' and 'Shop by Category' sections on the home page are fetching data correctly now.

acceptanceCriteria: Shop by Category section displays all available categories in a grid
Category cards show category images and names
Clicking a category navigates to the catalog page filtered by that category
